abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32659028, pmid32662899, pmid32657430, pmid32652898, pmid32658860, pmid32663348, pmid32644985, pmid32662421, pmid32662390, pmid32657484
